colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES PADMA DBANG CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA YAB YUM LHAN SKYES KYI SGRUB THABS BDUD LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DGE SBYONG RIG PA 'DZIN PA'I THA SHAL BA, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES LUGS 'DI'I MKHA' GRUB GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RNAMS SNYING POR DRIL TE GNAD DON TSANG ZHING NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BAR SBYAR BA, 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA DANG 'GRO BA'I PHAN BDE'I LEGS TSOGS PEL NUS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
